Class EditReviewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.EditReviewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreensIF

    public class EditReviewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreensIF
    EditReviewController is the controller that responsible to show a review and allows to approve or decline it.
    Author:
    ork
